body.name: UPPAbaby Alta High Back Booster Seat/Seven-Position, Active Support Headrest/SecureFit Integrated Belt Guide + Positioner/Removable Cup Holder Included/Noa (Navy Mélange)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 9 hrs 37 mins
features: EFFECTIVENESS OF HIGH BACK: High-back boosters provide enhanced safety features by ensuring optimal body positioning that helps absorb impact and better protect the head and torso.
PROPER FIT EVERY TIME: Our unique SecureFit belt routing system with lap belt positioner ensures proper fit for the lap and shoulder belt while preventing submarining.
LOCK IN SECURITY: Rigid LATCH connectors secure the booster to the vehicle seat guaranteeing proper alignment and positioning for everyday use.
GROWS WITH THEM: The seven-position, Active Support Headrest accommodates growing children. The Alta is suitable for children from 40–100 lbs, and 38–57” in height.
ADDED HEAD PROTECTION: Specialized, energy-absorbing foams provide added Side Impact Protection.
SIDE IMPACT PODS: Positioned on the side of shell and always engaged, the Side Impact Pods absorb and disperse crash forces for added safety and protection.

INCLUDED CUP HOLDER: The spacious seat design paired with dual armrests, and removable cup holder provides added comfort for your child during the ride. The dishwasher safe cup holder can attach to either side of the seat for added convenience.
REMOVABLE, WASHABLE FABRICS: Messes happen! The removeable, washable fabrics on the Alta make it simple to clean and reattach. The seat base fabric zips right off for easy cleaning.

A CHEMICAL-FREE CHOICE: Keep baby safe from day one with our original fire retardant free fabric. These SafeTech fabrics on the Alta are not treated and contain no harmful chemicals anywhere on the seat.

GREENGUARD GOLD CERTIFIED: Travel with confidence knowing your little one is in a safe & comfortable environment with our GREENGUARD Gold Certification. The Alta has been tested & proven to support healthier air quality & low chemical emissions.
body.description: The ALTA 7 Position Active Support Headrest with SecureFit, easily adjusts to ensure proper belt fit and positioning for your child while Side Impact Pods on the shell provide advanced side impact protection. Rigid LATCH connection secures the seat to the vehicle for when not in use and aids in properly positioning the child in the seat. Included dishwasher safe cup holder make longer trips a breeze. Approximately: 6 – 10 years Weight: 40 – 100 lbs Height: 38” – 57”

productInformation.name: Care instructions
productInformation.value: ‎Machine wash in cold water on gentle cycle with mild detergent. Do not bleach. Dry Flat and away from direct sunlight before re-use or storage. Do not iron or dry clean.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Safety, elevated. Secure your child on the last phase of their car seat journey with the ALTA High-Back Belt Positioning Booster. From energetic elementary school kids to independent pre-teens, the ALTA delivers proper seat and belt positioning with style, comfort and ease. Specifications: Approximately 6 – 10 years old Weight: 40 – 100 lbs Height: 38” – 57”

Buckle up. Move on. The SecureFit belt routing system ensures a proper fit for lap and shoulder belts thanks to a big difference belt guides and a unique lap belt positioner. Grows with them The seven-position, Active Support Headrest accommodates growing children. Sit back and relax The spacious design paired with dual armrests provides added comfort for your child during the ride. A small feature that makes a big difference Specialized foams provide added side impact protection. Positioned on the side of shell, the side impact pods absorb and disperse crash forces.

Hydrate on the go and easily clean spills The ALTA includes a removable cup holder that can attach to either side of the seat. When spills happen, the seat base fabric quickly zips off for easy cleaning while being machine washable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Design flaw with section where the shoulder belt routes through the booster seat
reviews.reviewText: The booster seats are good overall. However, my kids often cause the seat belt to lock up. Unfortunately, the shoulder strap routes through a section of the booster seat which is difficult to get the shoulder strap in or out of. So every time my boys lock up the seat belt, it takes me about 3-5 minutes of struggling to get the shoulder strap out of that section of the booster seat in order to unlock the seat belt and then have to route the seatbelt back in to that section again.I likely would not ever purchase these seats again due to this frustrating issue that I deal with almost daily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to like this booster seat however it needs improvement!! My son said it was very uncomfortable (not enough cushioning on back and seat). There is a thin covering the back when the top is raised for height. My son found it hard to buckle himself (he has been buckling himself, in his current Britax booster with lap guide, for about 3+ years). The cup holder snaps into the arm rest, this makes it very difficult to weave the seatbelt around it. In order for my son to buckle himself, I had to move the cup holder to the other arm rest, next to the door, which my kids, as I’m sure most, bump into their cup getting out and I’m left chasing a rolling cup through or under cars in a parking lot. It is a very poor placement for the cup holder. The arm rests need to be higher because there isn’t much room to get buckle in between the arm rest and seat base.I liked the size and that it could seat a child until 10. This booster is designed for 6-10 yr. olds. I liked the seat cover and how easy it would be to remove to clean.Needs improvement:1. Cushioning / comfort2. Arm rests need to be higher off base3. Cup holder placement or place cup holder in the base like most booster seats

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice booster and decent price
reviews.reviewText: We had Nuna Rava car seat and it was great but Nuna booster seemed very flimsy. I checked out Clek too, but it was kinda bulky and heavy, and attachment mechanism looked like could scratch leather seats. This uppababy is great, not neavy, not bulky, pretty wide and comfortable, attachment can easily hide inside if not used. Not as sturdy as Clek but still much better than Nuna and many other boosters
